name: The Reverse Broke
description:
hello, i am Leonardo the 11 yeasr old who created this game.

this game is a 2d shooter where you shoot walls and jump spikes (so i guess you can call it a platformer). there are 2 levels in challenge mode and an endless mode.

made with: construct 2 free (coding), Jpixel (art) and Bosca Ceoil (for what may be  defined music).

Good Game
